raju itha sathutata ha pahadimata path wuna.watina thagi bhoga di manikkaruwa pitath kara hariya.in pasu raju thawusa desata hari thawusage athin allagena ohu rajasanaya matha hindawuwa.”thapasa rajuni,obage thyagaye watinakama mage rajyaye athi siyalu dhanayata hama athin ma samanayi.mewan watina thyagayak ma wetha pirinamimen oba kumak balaporoththu wanne dayi pawasana lesa ayada sitinawa thapasathumani.”
